about_the_game:
This isn't just your average western stand-off - there's elemental raccoons, a heaven for robots, a living computer program gone haywire, and - a kid that just fell out of the sky?

The QUICKDRAW Original Soundtrack features every tune found in the original NES-style video game as well as three all new original chiptunes set in the world of android cowgirls and game-breaking, shapeshifting glitches!

QUICKDRAW was created by Fantasma Collective and originally released in 2021 featuring music by Victor Granados. Written entirely in FamiTracker's emulator of the 2A03 sound chip.

Album Artwork: Andrew 'AJ' Busso
Music: Victor Granados

name: QUICKDRAW Soundtrack
short_description: Original Soundtrack for QUICKDRAW composed by Victor Granados. 7 original tracks included.
